div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1119 Cherronesus environs (near mod. Se- vastopol'), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1968 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C.? (Golenko) Contents: 6 AR, c. 132 AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: 6 didr. and dr. (as BMC 1, 2) 122 AE (as BMC 6, 7-8; Zograph, pl. 35, 16) Disposition: Sevastopol' 128 Gilevich, in Arkheologicheskie otkrytiia 1968 goda (Moscow, 1969), pp. 295-6
